entry.title: Natural Volcanic Pumice Stone
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 9.99

Pumice stones are volcanic rocks that form when lava mixes with water, and cools into a hardened, lightweight, porous stone with a roughly textured surface. The abrasive material is great for gently removing dry, excess skin and exfoliation.

The small and large natural pores provide effective removal of thick or dry skin and calluses. Slough away dead skin from cracked feet and dry elbows, allowing your beautiful healthy skin to emerge. 

Our Natural Pumice Stone's ideal size and ergonomic shape fit perfectly in the palm of your hand for a comfortable scrub of tough callused and hardened skin, on the foot's heel, ball, and hard-to-reach contours of your feet.

For best results, soak your feet for 5 to 10 minutes in warm water before buffing with a pumice stone, it's recommend to also wet the stone before use. Use gentle circular motions and don’t buff the same area for more than a few minutes at a time. 

Rinse the pumice stone with warm water after each use and hang in a dry area to prevent bacteria growth. You can periodically clean it with a bristle brush, warm water and soap, and disinfect in lightly boiling water for five minutes to prevent any bacteria or fungus growth.

entry.title: Natural Sisal Soap Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 5.25

Customize your own soap on a rope, wash and exfoliate at the same time!

Don’t let your soap disintegrate sitting in its own scum. Hang to dry to extend the life of your soaps and avoid gross build up.

Unlimited uses for this versatile, durable and natural sisal bag. Store all your goodies in boho-chic style - great for jewelry, change and to stop keys from scratching everything in your bag!

Includes: 1 Natural Sisal Soap Bag

entry.title: Mint Shampoo Bar - Georgian Bay Soapworks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 7.00

Ban the plastic shampoo bottle from your washroom! Our Mint Shampoo Bar is similar to our Lavender Shampoo Bar but with the added tingle of mint and rosemary.  Simply lather and rinse.

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Water, Palm Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Castor Oil, Essential Oils of Peppermint, Spearmint and Rosemary.
Includes: 1 Mint Shampoo Bar - approx 75g

At Georgian Bay Soapworks we are concerned about the activities and practices in the Palm Oil industry that affect our planet and wildlife and we believe in and support the production of Palm Oil in a sustainable manner.

Our Palm Oil is sourced from suppliers who are members and certified suppliers of RSPO (Roundtable of Sustainable Palm Oil)

entry.title: Soap Saver
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 4.25

Save your Soap! Prevent a wasteful soapy puddle and a mushy bar of soap by elevating your soap and allowing the entire bar to dry evenly. Great for kitchens, bath sinks, tubs, or showers and can be trimmed to fit any soap dish. 

Just needs a quick rinse under a faucet to clean.

Save your money and our planet by replacing your plastic liquid refill bottles with good old fashioned, eco friendly bar soap!

Includes: 1 Soap Saver
